backend/main.mo: Defines core actor state and types for categories, products, garden centers, orders, and authorization, including persistent hierarchical category support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin‑related features to their affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, layout components, pages, and store hooks for the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, app shell, providers, and all storefront, admin, and portal routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access‑denied message with optional Principal ID and a link to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic error handling and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Component displaying the user's Principal ID with clipboard‑copy functionality and feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Ensures the user is authenticated and a platform admin before rendering children, otherwise shows loading skeletons or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Checks for authentication and displays a login prompt card if the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Requires the user to be authenticated and have a customer role, showing skeletons or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Allows access only to authenticated garden center members or platform admins, with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Restricts content to authenticated platform admins, showing loading feedback or an access denied screen with principal info.
Provides the main app layout with header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media and contact links with icons for WhatsApp, Instagram, and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site footer with brand info, quick links, service areas, and contact methods.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the main site header with logo, navigation links, portals, admin links, cart badge, and mobile menu support.
Shows a small badge with the cart item count when the cart is not empty.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product card with image, description, price, stock status, and links to the product page.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides React Query mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder for toggling product active status.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches products for a garden center by filtering all active products due to missing backend support.
Provides React Query hooks to fetch and manage garden centers and team members, with several operations stubbed due to missing backend endpoints.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Defines mutations for granting and revoking platform admin access using actor methods and invalidates role queries.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role from the backend and provides a helper to check if the caller is a platform admin.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Queries the backend for the caller's user profile and exposes loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Checks whether the caller is an admin by querying the backend's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Provides a mutation to save the caller's user profile and refresh related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Mutation hook to create a garden center and invalidate related role and center queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Handles querying and modifying products for a garden center, with several operations unimplemented due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Fetches the user's primary garden center, returning a placeholder structure until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Mutation to update a garden center and refresh dependent queries upon success.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Queries the user's orders but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Defines a mutation for placing orders but throws an error since backend functionality is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches the list of product categories from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Retrieves the full category taxonomy including subcategories.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches details for a single product by ID.
Provides queries for active products, category-filtered products, and client-side search.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and tracks the backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global layout utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Provides admin tools to manage garden centers, including viewing, expanding details, and performing member or nursery actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Allows platform admins to add or remove admin access by validating and submitting Principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Lets admins create products, toggle product active status, view categories and active products, and initialize seed data.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, totals, and navigation to checkout or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the product catalog with search, category filters, and taxonomy-based product listing.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order review and placement, requiring Internet Identity authentication and clearing the cart on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero, feature highlights, and category previews using taxonomy data.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's order history with status badges, product details, totals, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Implements the nursery dashboard with garden center editing, product management, and category selection using multiple hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message after checkout and optionally displays the order ID with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Redirects authenticated customers to the catalog and shows loading or access-denied states based on role.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Handles nursery portal access, redirects existing members, and provides a form to register a new garden center.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Checks for platform admin access, redirects admins to the dashboard, and shows identity info or access-denied screens.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with an image gallery, quantity selector, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart context with state management, persistence, and actions for adding, updating, and removing items.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing cart data from localStorage with versioned storage support.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for cart items, state, actions, and context type.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Custom hook that exposes the cart context and ensures it’s used inside the provider.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions for flattening category trees, finding nodes, and identifying leaf or descendant categories.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature list for the GreenPlantz multi-role web and mobile app.
